CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(Account_CTC__r.Active__c), FALSE, IF( AND( OR( Account_CTC__r.Code_Record_Type__c = 'Corporate code Amadeus', Account_CTC__r.Code_Record_Type__c = 'Corporate code Apollo', Account_CTC__r.Code_Record_Type__c = 'Corporate code Galileo', Account_CTC__r.Code_Record_Type__c = 'Corporate code Sabre' ), Account_CTC__r.Corp_Tracking_Type_And_Code__r.Active_Account_PCCs__c = 0 ), FALSE, TRUE ) )
CustomField.label: Active
